availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Baily (Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, flat boat pilot)

body.p: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, flat boat pilot. Maryland native. Married to Paulina Lowery Baily, on June 20, 1850. Father of Ezariah F. Baily and Thomas L. Baily. Flat boat pilot in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, District 1, p. 82.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carroll County Marriages, Film #000414689, p.299.
